author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by GameMaker, the free, fast, and easy-to-use 2D game engine that’s helped power modern classics like UFO 50, Antonblast, and Yahtzee’s Starstruck Vagabond – https://opr.as/SecondWind-3

This week on Hidden Gems, KC and Jess play Blood of Mehran -- https://store.steampowered.com/app/1714530/Blood_of_Mehran/

If you dig Hot Monday Energy, consider supporting us over on Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

title: 360 Era Hack and Slash with Blood of Mehran | Hot Monday Energy

author: Second Wind
description:
On this week’s episode of Windbreaker, Yahtzee, JM8, and Jesse Galena discuss about “atmosphere” in games. What does the term mean to us, which games do it well, and why do they succeed?

If you dig the stuff we make, consider supporting us over at Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Check out our new shirts over at DFTBA -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

Get your Adventure is Nigh! plushies over at Shark Robot -- https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind
title: What Makes a Great “Atmosphere” | Windbreaker Podcast

author: Second Wind
description:
In today's episode, J & Ludo delve into Pokémon's past and present to see if the developers have been intentionally wasting its players time over the years.

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Intruder - Stray OST
The Abyss - Hyper Light Drifter OST
Checking in - Celeste OST
The Notebooks - Stray OST
Green Path - Hollow Knight OST
Secret Lab - Stray OST
title: Is Pokémon Intentionally Designed to Waste Your Time? | Design Delve
